participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and hands-on, I enjoy creating and exploring the world around me.
participant_1.background: I like to build things. I am tall. I like to travel. I love the outdoors.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and nurturing, I thrive on helping others and sharing my love for literature.
participant_2.background: My major was american literature and education. I want to teach kids in elementary school. On weekends I like to go hiking. I just graduated college.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking and read.
Oh, me too! I love hiking. Where do you like to hike?
I like to hike in the mountains. I just graduated from college and I'm going to be teaching elementary school.
That's great! What made you want to teach elementary school?
I've always loved working with kids. I also love reading and writing, so I think teaching will be a good fit for me.
I'm sure you'll be a great teacher! You sound like you're really passionate about it.
Thanks! I'm excited to start my career.
So, what are you doing after graduation?
I'm going to be moving to a new city to start my job.
Oh, cool! Where are you moving to?
I've heard good things about [city]. It's a beautiful city.
I'm looking forward to exploring it.
Thanks! I'm excited to start this new chapter in my life.
